description: Foxglove's interactive visualization, advanced debugging, and data management capabilities empowers robotic developers to understand how their robots sense, think, and act in dynamic and unpredictable environments. All with the performance and scalability needed to create autonomy and build reliable robots.

funding.investors: Bessemer Venture Partners, with participation from existing investors Eclipse and Amplify Partners
funding.raw: Foxglove, a data and observability platform for Physical AI, announced a $40 million Series B funding round on November 12, 2025. The round was led by Bessemer Venture Partners, with participation from existing investors Eclipse and Amplify Partners. This funding will support the expansion of Foxglove's platform to cover the complete data lifecycle for robotics development and deployment. The company has now raised over $58 million since its founding in 2021.

recent_news: In 2025, Foxglove underwent a significant rebranding, launching a new brand identity on April 22nd to better reflect its position as "The observability stack for physical AI." In November 2025, the company announced it had raised $40 million in Series B financing, led by Bessemer Venture Partners. Foxglove was also recognized in *The Robot Report*'s Startup Radar. The company has a partnership with Shield AI, and its platform is utilized by major industry players.
